snippet: The president highlighted Austin’s educational and economic successes and accused adversaries of putting politics ahead of policies that could speed up the recovery.
lead_paragraph: The president highlighted Austin’s educational and economic successes and accused adversaries of putting politics ahead of policies that could speed up the recovery.

headline.seo: In Texas Visit, Obama Hopes to Spotlight Manufacturing
headline.main: In Texas Visit, Obama Points Spotlight on Manufacturing
headline.print_headline: In Texas Visit, Obama Points Spotlight on Manufacturing
